Key: Where am I? Am I back in Tengu City?
What the—?! What is that thing?!
Is that Neo Tengu Tower?! What's going on?!
And where's everyone else?! Rinne's still separated from me!

(Rinne, you're safe, right? Please, tell me you're just hiding
somewhere.)

(Come on. That has to be the case. I mean, she can't be gone. How
can Rinne be...)
Shido! You made it through!
Kotori?! Everyone! You guys are safe?!

(...?! Kotori's wearing her Astral Dress.
Wait, are her regeneration powers back?)

Yes. Seems like everyone got out. But...
There's something up with Tengu City.
Especially Neo Tengu Tower. It's ominous...
Yeah, seems like it.
Is that all you're worried about?
Kurumi, can I trust you as an ally?

Yes. With regards to our situation, I promise to cooperate. I
refuse to be sucked in. Although, I do not intend on asking you to
trust me.

Don't be like that. If you ask me to trust you, I will. A
temporary truce will do. Thanks for your help.

My, my. I suppose I have no choice but to do my best when you put
it that way. Why the change of heart?

I'm... starting to remember. The memory of dating you is coming
back to me.
Oh, is that so? I have recollection of it.

I can't blame you, but I remember it clearly.
Hence why I've decided to trust you.

Hehe. I see. An interesting train of thought.
So that's his take, but what about you?
Glaring at me forever must be so tiring.
If Shido says so, then I won't object.

Well, I think I believe you. So long as we share a common goal,
I'll trust you. You don't seem foolish enough to mistake our
predicament.
Compliment taken, I suppose.
I was so worried about you, Shido! Have you been harmed?
I'm fine. How are you, Tohka?

F-Fine... I remember little, save for being flown back, but
nothing serious.

Ah, what a relief. What about you, Yoshino?
You okay?
Y...Yes! Glad to see you're safe, Shido-san.
Of course. Good to see you, Yoshino.
Heeeey! That's messed up, Shido-kun!\nI exist too, you know!

Oh, sorry, sorry! Who knows what'll come next, so take care of
Yoshino, okay Yoshinon?
Man, you're such a sweet talker. Well, just like you said,\nShido-kun, Yoshino's got me, so no need to worry.
Yeah. I'm counting on you.
Shido, what about me?
O-Origami?! Um, sorry for getting you involved in this...
I don't mind. If Ruler is a Spirit, then this concerns me as well.
Right...
So what's the deal, Shido?
Huh? What do you mean?

(I told Kotori and the others what I knew up till then. And how
Rinne hasn't made it back yet...)
Rinne is... gone?
Yeah. We were split up, and I haven't seen her since.
I see. That worries me. So, have you noticed anything else?
Um, no. Not yet.
Hm. Understood. We'll leave it there for now.
But why is this Ruler going after Shido?
I don't know, but... I want to speak with Ruler again.

I don't know why, but I've got a feeling that Ruler isn't a bad
person.
Shido...

Let's make her stop this, and get all of us out of this once and
for all!
Yes! I'm here to help, Shido.
R-Really?!
Yes, of course!
Me too.
Huh?
I told you. I can't watch you dive into danger.
Besides, Tohka Yatogami isn't enough to support you.
HEY! What is that supposed to mean, Origami Tobiichi?!

I mean exactly what I said. Your pre-school comprehension appalls
me.
GRRRRR!
Hey, no fighting, you two! We're all on the same side here.
Oh... Sorry!
If you say so, Shido.

Shido, there's no time. If we linger here, the world's going to
end.

Then we've got no choice but to act! We won't let them destroy our
city! I'm still figuring out what Ruler's plan is.

Why is she doing this? It's all unknown. If we could just talk,
then maybe we won't have to battle her.
Shido, you optimistic dumbass.
What? I'm just doing what I can—

I didn't say it was a bad thing. Let's head to the enemy's base.
Ratatoskr's job is to aid you, Shido.

(Everyone nodded silently. We all know the stakes. Ruler's waiting
for us at Neo Tengu Tower.)

Normally, we'd leave you behind since you can't revive, but if
Ruler is in fact a Spirit, you may be able to seal her.

Shido, you're our only hope, but be careful.
Failure could mean your life.
Yeah, I know.
Shido, we're right behind you. So when all of this ends...
You want me to take you to dinner...?
You know me well... Promise?
Yeah, I promise!
Sh-Shido...san!
Wh-What's the matter?
Please, take care of Ruler-san. I... I will do my best to help!
Yoshino...
Wow. Look's all serious now, huh Shido-kun?
Hey, Yoshinon... I'm always serious.
Right-o. Then, you can count me in.
Thanks, Yoshinon.
I got a move or two I could bust out!
Goodness, Shido-san. Such an angel, aren't you?
Wh-What do you mean?
Hehe. Nothing. Now that everything's set, shall we be on our way?
Kurumi, I can't tell if you're being sassy.

My, did it seem so? It can't be helped.
You're so kind to me.
It's not like that...
For you, I'd skin a thousand men, no matter the circumstances.
Wha... What?!

Hehe. Unfortunately though, it'll have to wait.
First, we need to pay Ruler a visit.
Y-Yeah!

We don't have the luxury of time right now.
Let's go, Shido.

Got it! Okay, our next destination: Neo Tengu Tower! I know Ruler
is there!
Yes. The barrier's core has got to be there.

The barrier's core? Wait, if we can destroy that, then we may not
have to fight Ruler.

There's a chance. But before that, there's somewhere we need to
go.
Hm? There is?

According to my tests, there's a barrier surrounding Neo Tengu
Tower as well.
It blocks all outside entry.

Right. We need to destroy the barrier's keystones, or we're stuck
out here.

The barrier's keystones... Wait! Kurumi, remember? That means,
Tohka and Origami...

Keystone. You refer to the monument in front of the tower,
correct?

And the outlet tower adjacent to the lake, near the site of the
enemy attack, right?

Hehehe. And the last shrine makes three.
These are the keystones supporting Neo Tengu Tower's barrier,
remember?
You all remember?!
I-I do...! I... went with you, Shido-san...
You too, Yoshino?!
My, my. What a charmer. Got everyone here wrapped around your\nfinger, huh?
Wh-What? I didn't mean it like that...

Shido, enough of these games. Let's begin.
We don't have much time.
All right. Let's go!
We'll need to split into groups then, huh?
What? I'm just doing what I can—
FFT!

(?! I-I see... She said we couldn't go in yet.
We'll need to do something about those keystones.)

The monument near Tengu Tower. Hmm.
Yoshino and Yoshinon, could you two handle it?
Y-Yes...! I'll try my best!
Well, you can count on me!
I'm relying on you, Yoshino and Yoshinon.
Roger!
Sh-Shido-san... I'll... see you later!
Be careful, all right?
Okay...! Um!
Hm? What's up?
I-I promise... I'll be successful!
All right! I'll be waiting for you!
The outlet tower will be—
I'll go.
What?
Origami Tobiichi?

Not for you, for Shido. Besides, I have a history with the
location.
Hmph. You're telling me you don't need your equipment?

Not an issue. If the city is deserted there like it is here, I'll
be fine. Not that I expect any trouble.
Noted. Then, show me what the Wizard of the AST is made of.
Shido, wait.
Will you be okay alone? Should someone else—

Not an issue. Going alone is easier. If I'm with a Spirit, I might
slip.
Got it. Be careful!

Kotori Itsuka. While I'm away from Shido, promise that'll keep him
safe. If you endanger him, I'm coming for you.
No need to tell me that.
The rest of you...
You're sending me away, aren't you?
Why don't you go already?

My, so difficult to please. Kihi... Kihihi...
Very well. That one. I'll eat her in an instant.
...Sure you will.

Hihi hihihihi... One day, I look forward to settling my score with
you.
H-Hey, Kurumi?
Don't worry, Shido-san. I'll be back soon.
(I-I wasn't worried about that...)
Good day.
O-Okay, good luck!
Kotori? Everyone's gone, so what next?

The enemy may attack Shido again. We're keeping Shido safe until
the keystones are destroyed.
Got it!
Thanks, everyone!

No need to thank me. If you're grateful, then think of some ways
to persuade Ruler for me.
Ugh... Y-You're right.
This isn't good. The destruction is spreading.
Ah... We either act now, or the world as we know it—
Hey! Kotori! We have more immediate concerns!
Are those—?!

Yup, right on time! Tohka! You're on!
Camael!

Yes! Leave it to me! Shido, don't leave my side!
Sandalphon!
Aah! Y-Yoshinon! Huh?!
Come on! Go time, Yoshino!
G-Got it... Zadkiel...!
Fate calls once more...
Kihihi... Now, come forth.
Oh, you think you can take me?
Ahahahahahaha! Where are you aiming? I'm—
Over here!
Hehe... Fear not. The fun... has just begun!
It's starting. I must hurry.
Ah... There's another one!

Grr... There are too many enemies! Is it not time to penetrate the
barrier?
Tohka! Hold on just a bit longer!
G-Got it! Shido!
Wha?!
Get out of the way, Shido!
*grunt*!
K-Kotori?!

I was expecting the worst, so I didn't want to kick it into high
gear, but... I guess I have no choice.
Here I go... Megido!
Aah! More are coming!
I... I know...!
We can't stay on the defensive! We need to fulfill our promise to\nShido-kun!
*grunt*!
Yoshino, be brave! Let's do this!
O...Okay! I'll do my best!
All right! There you go! Let's bring this monument down!
O-Okay...!
Zadkiel! G...GOOOOOOO!
Ashes, we all fall down!
*pant, pant*... *pant, pant*...
You did it, Yoshino! YAY! Good job!

I-It's all thanks to you... Yoshinon! Thank...
you!
Come on! This is all you, Yoshino! Shido-kun would sure be\nproud!
Y...Yeah! I wonder Shido-san... is safe.
Don't worry. I bet everyone's doing fine.
Right! I agree!
Target locked... You've no idea what I have in store for you.
HAAA!
*grunt* Destroying each one is pointless.
As expected, they're multiplying...
The mission must be accomplished!

I'm going to make this tower disappear.
Missile unit, all coordinates locked! Blastark!
All weapons, fire!
Territory condensation. White Licorice, ignite!
Take it down, Blastark!
*pant* ...*pant*... *pant*... *pant*...
I-I did it? *grunt*...!
My limit? *pant, pant*... I can no longer use the Licorice.
Shido, be safe until I get there...
